item.title: Windows 7 vs vista
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:29, topic:348411”]Well of course you noticed a speed difference… You just installed a new operating system… Anything would have ran faster at that point.[/quote]That. People just have an inherent hate for Vista because it sucked until they started releasing service packs. This isn’t something new, Windows XP sucked ass on first release, it was more buggy than Vista, and the risk of getting infected with a trojan was basically 50/50 on your first connection.

item.title: Windows 7 vs vista
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:25, topic:348411”][quote author=justinxg27 link=topic=444789.msg3266629#msg3266629 date=1278901762]

There is no doubt or discussion about 7 being better than Vista, whether it is better than XP is still up for debate. And of course I believe Linux (such as Kubuntu) is better than all of them.
[/quote]This. XP is probably the best OS from windows released. Although, Windows 7 is basically XP but with the Aero type of glassy look to it.

Windows 7 is not ‘basically’ XP, it’s entirely different and uses code based on vista instead of XP, it uses vista drivers and not XP ones, etc etc.[/quote]
What I mean’t was performance wise.

Read full topic

item.title: Windows 7 vs vista
item.dc:creator: @mrjad mrjad
item.description:
@mrjad wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:25, topic:348411”][quote author=justinxg27 link=topic=444789.msg3266629#msg3266629 date=1278901762]

There is no doubt or discussion about 7 being better than Vista, whether it is better than XP is still up for debate. And of course I believe Linux (such as Kubuntu) is better than all of them.
[/quote]This. XP is probably the best OS from windows released. Although, Windows 7 is basically XP but with the Aero type of glassy look to it.

Windows 7 is not ‘basically’ XP, it’s entirely different and uses code based on vista instead of XP, it uses vista drivers and not XP ones, etc etc.

[quote author=mrjad link=topic=444789.msg3266660#msg3266660 date=1278904532]

[quote author=justinxg27 link=topic=444789.msg3266629#msg3266629 date=1278901762]

There is no doubt or discussion about 7 being better than Vista, whether it is better than XP is still up for debate. And of course I believe Linux (such as Kubuntu) is better than all of them.
[/quote]This. XP is probably the best OS from windows released. Although, Windows 7 is basically XP but with the Aero type of glassy look to it.
[/quote] I personally love windows 7, but the best OS kinda depends on what you do on you computer, for hosting a server linux wins no doubt, but if you working win 7

I work on computers for a living, and I use Linux. So that argument doesn’t work. Maybe if you play windows games on your computer then windows is better, otherwise Linux is better. :)[/quote]

eh, im not a fan of linux for working on computers, but if you like it im not gonna argue it

Read full topic

item.title: Windows 7 vs vista
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“justinxg27, post:23, topic:348411”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=444789.msg3266626#msg3266626 date=1278901426]
There is no doubt or discussion about 7 being better than Vista, whether it is better than XP is still up for debate. And of course I believe Linux (such as Kubuntu) is better than all of them.
[/quote]This. XP is probably the best OS from windows released. Although, Windows 7 is basically XP but with the Aero type of glassy look to it.[/quote]

Windows 7 is not ‘basically’ XP, it’s entirely different and uses code based on vista instead of XP, it uses vista drivers and not XP ones, etc etc.

[quote=“mrjad, post:24, topic:348411”][quote author=justinxg27 link=topic=444789.msg3266629#msg3266629 date=1278901762]

[quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=444789.msg3266626#msg3266626 date=1278901426]
There is no doubt or discussion about 7 being better than Vista, whether it is better than XP is still up for debate. And of course I believe Linux (such as Kubuntu) is better than all of them.
[/quote]This. XP is probably the best OS from windows released. Although, Windows 7 is basically XP but with the Aero type of glassy look to it.
[/quote] I personally love windows 7, but the best OS kinda depends on what you do on you computer, for hosting a server linux wins no doubt, but if you working win 7[/quote]

I work on computers for a living, and I use Linux. So that argument doesn’t work. Maybe if you play windows games on your computer then windows is better, otherwise Linux is better.

Read full topic

item.title: Windows 7 vs vista
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:

[quote=“Javafire, post:11, topic:348411”][quote author=spy man47 link=topic=444789.msg3265934#msg3265934 date=1278869145]
Windows 7 has the spead of Windows xp, but has the version and look of Vista…
[/quote]

  • better 64bit support, and epic driver support.

windows 7, is just fixed vista.

rename the title to: fixed window vs broken windows, what would you rather!

i lol’d hard, that’s all you think seven is?[/quote]That’s exactly what it is. That said, i prefer Vista over Windows 7 for several reasons, specifically because tons of apps i use do not run on win7 (or they run shit)
